articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks slide as major indexes in the region fall at least 1% each - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Thursday the central bank is committed to hiking rates "expeditiously" to tame inflation.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific fell in Friday morning trade as investors watch for market reaction to overnight remarks from U.S. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.
